description: famille rose porcelain teabowl and saucer; center with two fishermen; fluted rim and sides lightly molded with bamboo with alternating panels of turquoise or pink diaper pattern and blossoms on a black ground
dimension: a (saucer): H.3/4 x Dia.4-3/8 in.; b (teabowl): H.1-1/2 x Dia.2-1/2 in.
title: Teabowl and Saucer
